welcomeText:
Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc. is an OEM supplier for forging and casting since 1990. Our products service the industries of construction machinery, agricultural machinery, railway system and heavy duty trucking system.

On average every year, over 400 containers of various forgings/castings will be shipped to Germany, USA and Japan. All of these parts are under the supervision of our experienced QC team.

Our engineering department are able to work with drawings made by most prevail software.
